___api_link.description: API resource address of the entity.

___followers_count.description: The number of users following the playlist.

___items.description: Contents of the playlist (an array of Track objects).

___collaborative.description: True if the owner allows other users to modify the playlist.

___image.description: URL of a picture associated with the playlist.

___published.description: Indicates whether the playlist is publicly discoverable. This does not restrict access for users who already know the playlist's URI.
